Title: Implicit
Description: The auction is an implicit auction.

Title: Explicit
Description: The auction is an explicit auction.

Title: Rule Based
Description: The auction is a rule based auction.

Title: Mixed
Description: The auction is partially implicit and partially explicit.

Title: Explicit/split
Description: The auction concerns two explicit auctions on a split border.

Title: Shadow auction
Description: An explicit auction carried out in the case of the failure of an implicit auction.

Title: Flow-based
Description: The allocation is an implicit auction using flow-based capacity calculation.

Title: Continuous
Description: The auction type is continuous, i.e. there is no gate closure time when bids from the market participants are collected. Instead allocation procedure takes place immediately.
